title: Factors influencing exhibitor satisfaction in participating an exhibition in major venues in Surabaya
abstract: The increasing trend of exhibition industry in Surabaya is a sign for event organizers know how to compete in order to survive in this industry. This research aims to know factors that influencing exhibitor satisfaction in participating an exhibition in Surabaya using multiple regression model. In this research the writer will use two main theories which are the 5P of event marketing (product, price, place, public relation, and positioning) and exhibitor objective participate in an exhibition. The writer will use simple random sampling and will distribute questionnaires to the exhibitor. This research suggests that positioning and the objective of exhibitor participating an exhibition have significant influence toward the exhibitor satisfaction. On the other band, product, price, place, and public relation does not have significant influence toward exhibitor satisfaction.
contributors: Tessa Vanina Soetanto (Advisor 1); Juliana Caesaria Tandung (Examination Committee 1)
